home.Name: Corné Balie
home.title: Aspiring Full Stack Developer
home.description: I am a Developer with a passion for problem-solving and collaboration. I'm Committed to finding respectful and efficient solutions to any challenge.

about: I am a highly motivated and dedicated web developer with a passion for coding and technology. With my Higher Certificate, Diploma, and Advanced Diploma in ICT, as well as my additional studies at Life Choices Coding Academy, I have honed my skills in front-end development and multimedia applications.
My commitment to learning and improving my skills makes me a valuable asset to any team, and I am excited to bring my expertise to new and challenging projects.

skills.title: HTML
skills.experience: I have been doing HTML since High School and have been continuously developing this skill

skills.experience: I started learning CSS in High School. CSS is one of my Skills that I really enjoy using.

skills.experience: I started Learning JavaScript at University when I started with my Diploma in ICT.

skills.title: REACT
skills.experience: I really enjoy using JavaScript Frameworks. React is one of my Favourite Frameworks

skills.experience: My first Encounter with Vue was with an Assignment while studying at University.

skills.experience: I used NodeJs with MongoDB to create a JSON token appliication as an Assignment.

testimonials.name: Warren
testimonials.quotes: Studying alongside Corné for 5 years has been a privilege. His dedication and passion for IT are remarkable
